        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]



-- Examining data types

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://adlsnyctaxidata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE
    ) AS [result]'


-- Use WiTH clause to provide explicit data types
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsnyctaxidata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    )
    WITH(
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
       ) 
    AS [result]


-- Specifying UTF-8 collation for indivizual column names
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsnyctaxidata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    )
    WITH(
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
       ) 
    AS [result]

CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Specifying UTF-8 collation to DATABASE Level
ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;


SELECT NAME, COLLATION_NAME FROM SYS.DATABASES;

-- SELECTING COLUMNS AFTER APPLYING COLLATON TO DATABASE LEVEL
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsnyctaxidata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW= TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    )
    WITH(
    LocationID SMALLINT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50) ,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    ) 
    AS [result]



-- SELECT ONLY SUBSET OF COLOUMNS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsnyctaxidata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        FIRSTROW = 1
    )
    WITH(
    location_id bigint 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    ) 
    AS [result]
